text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinergaß sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Prideaun A. und N. Testam</TITLE>, in einer Connex. mit der Völcker-Historie, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE> <YEAR>1725</YEAR>. <VOLUME>4. 1I. Tom. 1. Vol. 2</VOLUME> à <PRIZE>Cattenburg</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas</TITLE>. <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl.</TITLE> <VOLUME>8r. 70.</VOLUME> <AUTHOR>Interpp. Reineccii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl. Hebr.</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>punctata Leusdenii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Frf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1694</YEAR>. <FORMAT>12.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seldenus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Diis Syris</TITLE>. <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1692</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Gottschedens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>critische Dichtkunst</TITLE>, <PLACE>Leipzig</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Bödickers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach</TITLE>, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>, <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":8,"explanation":"1. Fixed Unicode encoding issues: √ü → ß (Augustinergaß), √∂ → ö (Völcker, Bödickers), √† → à, √§ → ä (Grundsätze), √≤ → ° (degree symbol for format sizes). 2. Fixed malformed XML structure: The second BIBL element was missing its closing tag before the third BIBL began. Added </BIBL> after <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT> to properly close the \"Sapientia Mos.\" entry. The original had nested BIBL elements which was incorrect - each book entry should be a separate BIBL element at the same level."}

Vol. 2</VOLUME> à <PRIZE>Cattenburg</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas</TITLE>. <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl.</TITLE> <VOLUME>8r. 70.</VOLUME> <AUTHOR>Interpp. Reineccii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Bibl. Hebr.</TITLE> von <AUTHOR>punctata Leusdenii</AUTHOR>, <PLACE>Frf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1694</YEAR>. <FORMAT>12.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seldenus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>de Diis Syris</TITLE>. <PLACE>Lips.</PLACE> <YEAR>1692</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Gottschedens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>critische Dichtkunst</TITLE>, <PLACE>Leipzig</PLACE> <YEAR>1737</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Bödickers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach</TITLE>, <PLACE>Berlin</PLACE>, <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: 1. Fixed Unicode encoding issues: √ü → ß (Augustinergaß), √∂ → ö (Völcker, Bödickers), √† → à, √§ → ä (Grundsätze), √≤ → ° (degree symbol for format sizes). 2. Fixed malformed XML structure: The second BIBL element was missing its closing tag before the third BIBL began. Added </BIBL> after <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT> to properly close the "Sapientia Mos." entry. The original had nested BIBL elements which was incorrect - each book entry should be a separate BIBL element at the same level.
